casebody.data:
WALKER & STATEN
v.
FLEETWOOD HOMES. No. 223A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Clayton M. Custer, Greenville, SC, Philip J. Mohr, Winston-Salem, for Fleetwood Homes.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of May 2006 by Plaintiffs to Dismiss for Lack of Jurisdiction and Memorandum in Support Thereof:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
